mapper.select:
select count(1) from inf_orgs a where a.org_status = 1
and a.org_code = to_number(${areaCode})
and a.org_name like '%${areaName}%'

select * from ( select r.*, rownum rn from ( select a.org_code as areaCode , a.org_name as areaName , a.super_org as fatherArea , a.org_status as status , a.org_type as areaType from inf_orgs a where a.org_status = 1
and a.org_code = to_number(${areaCode})
and a.org_name like '%${areaName}%'
order by a.org_code) r ) where rn > ${beginNum} and rn <= ${endNum}
select count(1) from inf_agencys s where org_code = #{areaCode} and status = 1
select count(t.terminal_code) from saler_terminal t join inf_agencys a on a.agency_code = t.agency_code where a.org_code = #{areaCode} and a.status = 1 and (t.status = 1 or t.status = 2)
select count(t.teller_code) from inf_tellers t join inf_agencys a on a.agency_code = t.agency_code where a.org_code = #{areaCode} and a.status = 1 and (t.status = 1 or t.status = 2)

select a.org_code as areaCode , g.short_name as gameName , g.basic_type as gameType , g.game_code as gameCode , a.pay_commission_rate as payCommissionRate , a.sale_commission_rate as saleCommissionRate , a.allow_pay as allowPay , a.allow_sale as allowSale , a.allow_cancel as allowCancel from inf_games g, auth_org a where a.org_code = #{areaCode} and a.game_code = g.game_code order by g.game_code
select o.org_code as areaCode,o.org_name as areaName from inf_orgs o
